title: VIDEO TUTORIALS
description: List of videotutorials explaining the core functionalities of the platform.
detailedDescription:
## **Tutorials**

This section includes a list of videotutorials explaining the core functionalities of the platform

For a complete list of videotutorials: [**_onesait Platform videotutorials_**] (https://onesaitplatform.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OP/pages/31424597/Introductory+Videos)

- [**Ride on the Platform: Introducing our Open Platform**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V6MdKJJqXqw&feature=youtu.be)

  Shows some of the main capabilities of the platform, from GDPR support, ontologies, flows, apis, visualizations,

- [**Platform Core: Ontologies Management**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CKsm80HYyf4&feature=youtu.be)

  How to create and managed ontologies

- [**Using the API Manager**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f2hb1G5PiMg&feature=youtu.be)

  API Manager of the Platform

- [**Projects and Realms**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8HGK1NfOyIE&feature=youtu.be)

  Creating and managing Projects and Realms in the onesait Platform.

- [**Creating a Dashboard**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mKgH3bmJIHY&feature=youtu.be)

  Creating a Dashboard using Platform's storaged data

- [**Introduction: Dashboards**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oVBtTA6XQus&feature=youtu.be)

  More on Dashboards

- [**Rules in a Visual Way: FlowEngine**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YiLK8tCnPL4&feature=youtu.be)

  NodeRed based FlowEngine

- [**Generating a GIS viewer in a simple way**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5us8ArpuGGc&feature=youtu.be)

  How to create a GIS viewer and  integrated into a dashboard as an iframe

- [**Intelligence in the Platform: Notebooks**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6irNj3OenQI&feature=youtu.be)

  Analtytics example using notebooks

- [**Streaming Video Example: Introduction to Video Broker**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=13WYveaAFRA&feature=youtu.be)

  Demonstrating how to set up streaming video captures for frame processing, and creating a Dashboard to visualize results with the onesait Platform

- [**Digital Twins How to**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nTsUzhATlxc&feature=youtu.be)

  How to set up digital twins using onesait Platfomrs capabilities

- [**GDPR Compliance: Users Management**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=coQu27tZmZ8&feature=youtu.be)

  User management and GDPR policy implementation

- [**Deployment with Ansible and Rancher**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yk1NRpQci5g&feature=youtu.be)

  Deploying onesait Platform with Rancher CaaS

- [**Map Example: Temporal evolution in a map with platform's data**] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ioO0ncdyqyA&feature=youtu.be)

  Example of temporal evolution in a map consuming data from the platform
